已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    com.hf.live.util.sofia.Bar.fitsSystemWindowView(int)
    use Bar.fitsStatusBarView(int) instead.
    com.hf.live.util.sofia.Bar.fitsSystemWindowView(View)
    use Bar.fitsStatusBarView(View) instead.
    com.hf.live.view.CircleImageView.getFillColor()
    Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
    com.hf.live.view.CircleImageView.setBorderColorResource(int)
    Use CircleImageView.setBorderColor(int) instead
    com.hf.live.view.CircleImageView.setFillColor(int)
    Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
    com.hf.live.view.CircleImageView.setFillColorResource(int)
    Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
